Title: The Prophecy: Forsaken
Writer: Gregory Widen (characters), John Sullivan (story), Joel Soisson (teleplay)
Actors: Boris Petroff, Kari Wuhrer, Daria Ciobanu, John Light
Plot: Allison, the new guardian to the ancient manuscript, continues to try to protect it from another group of renegade angels bent on bringing on the end of the world.
